title: How to create a slide show with photos and background music? What are some examples - Quora

response.answer_text: Slideshow with music is best thing to save special moments. The easiest way to create a slideshow with music is to use a slide show making software program. If you search lots of slideshow maker. Some of these app/software are free and some are paid. There is some software that has some unique functionality, but most of them are of the similar type of features. Let's see at some of the best software/app to create a slideshow with music: Fotophire Slideshow Maker: This is a most populous to create the slideshow from WonderShare Fotophire, in which 200+ template(s) effects are creating amazing slideshows for various purposes like wedding, birthday, anniversary etc. You can easily add music to your slideshow in one click and share on social media directly. Here you can create any type of slideshow.  Slidely : This is a famous social media content that allows easy sharing of content on the network. Users can either import video or images from their home computer or access media directly from the social media platform as per the requirement.  Picasa : It is the easiest software to create slideshows using images and music, in which you can put lots of effects in your slideshow video. PicPlayPost, SlideLab many more app/software are available on the web. You can choose according to choice.
